allow: Bash(xargs -I {} sh -c 'filename=$\(basename {} .tsx\); filename=$\(basename $filename .ts\); export_name=$\(grep ""^export const"" {} | head -1 | sed ""s/export const \\\([^ =]*\\\).*/\\1/""\); if [ ""$filename"" != ""$export_name"" ]; then echo ""‚ùå {}: export=$export_name, file=$filename""; fi')
